mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.creator = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '106'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and ll.rfid_id like '%${rfidId}%'
and ll.parameter_name like '%${parameterName}%'
and ll.create_time like '%${createTime}%'

SELECT eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, dev.device_name, ll.rfid_id, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, ll.parameter_name, ll.parameter_num, cur.USER_NAME AS createName, ll.create_time FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.creator = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '106'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and ll.rfid_id like '%${rfidId}%'
and ll.parameter_name like '%${parameterName}%'
and ll.create_time like '%${createTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
